title: Turn your TV into a work of art with Samsung's crystal-clear Frame TV—it's $400 off right now
text:
Yahoo Lifestyle is committed to finding you the best products at the best prices. We may receive a share from purchases made via links on this page.

The Samsung Frame TV transforms into a rotating art display. (Photo: Amazon) More

TVs are great — but only when they’re on. Switched off, they’re just big black boxes taking up precious space in the living room. Not anymore. Samsung’s Frame TV doubles as a gorgeous piece of art. Imagine it over a fireplace! Walmart has the TV in a range of sizes on sale for up to $1,202 off, starting with the Samsung 43" Class 4K UHD (2160P) The Frame QLED Smart TV QN43LS03R for just $798 (originally $1,299).

The devices work with Alexa and feature “no gap wall mount” for hanging flush to the wall.

The 4K TV (four times the resolution of full HD) is crisp and bright, thanks to Quantum Dot technology which offers a billion shades of color. One slim cable connects all your tech gear, so no more unsightly wires dangling off your TV.

You can buy individual pieces of art to display or subscribe to a library of rotating pieces. If you choose motion sensor mode, the TV will detect when you’re in the room and automatically showcase your favorite work. What a way to impress guests!

Both TVs have free two-day shipping via Walmart. Want to pick it up yourself? Select the “free pickup” option, and drive over to your nearest Walmart to get your hands on the stunning device.

This TV can blend in with any decor. (Photo: Walmart) More

“The quality and value of the frame TV is worth every penny!” a happy reviewer noted. “I'm beyond satisfied with my purchase and I would recommend this to anyone looking for a new tv option for their home. The art feature is one of my favorite especially when I would rather have my wall not look like there is a tv there. This is the best of both worlds — art and entertainment! Let alone the mount and one connected source all is included with the TV. Get your frame TV today you won't regret it!”

“Bought the Samsung 50 inch TV and could not believe the picture quality,” one thrilled reviewer shared. “Could not believe the difference from previous different brand TV. After two weeks of use was so impressed I went out and bought two more 40 inch Samsung TV's one for the bedroom and one for our cabin. I am hooked on Samsung.”

Shop it: Samsung 43-inch Class 4K UHD (2160P) The Frame QLED Smart TV QN43LS03R, starting at $798 (originally $1,299). Available in sizes up to 65-inch for $1,598 (was $2,800) walmart.com
